TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeConstructor extends System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod

Docs.summary: Represents a declaration for an instance constructor of a type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor> can be used to represent a declaration of an instance constructor for a type. Use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeConstructor> to declare a static constructor for a type.
If the constructor calls a base class constructor, set the constructor arguments for the base class constructor in the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor.BaseConstructorArgs%2A> property. If the constructor overloads another constuctor for the type, set the constructor arguments to pass to the overloaded type constructor in the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor.ChainedConstructorArgs%2A> property.
## Examples This example demonstrates using a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor> to declare several types of constructors.
[!code-cpp[CodeConstructorExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeConstructorExample/CPP/codeconstructorexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CodeConstructorExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeConstructorExample/CS/codeconstructorexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CodeConstructorExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeConstructorExample/VB/codeconstructorexample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BaseConstructorArgs As CodeExpressionCollection
public: property System::CodeDom::CodeExpressionCollection ^ BaseConstructorArgs { System::CodeDom::CodeExpressionCollection ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of base constructor arguments.
Docs.value: A that contains the base constructor arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor> overloads a base class constructor, this collection contains any arguments to pass to a base class constructor. To call a base class constructor with no arguments, set a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression> containing an empty string ("") to this collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChainedConstructorArgs As CodeExpressionCollection
public: property System::CodeDom::CodeExpressionCollection ^ ChainedConstructorArgs { System::CodeDom::CodeExpressionCollection ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of chained constructor arguments.
Docs.value: A that contains the chained constructor arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeConstructor> overloads another constructor of the same type, this collection contains any arguments to pass to the overloaded type constructor. To call a constructor for the current type with no arguments, set a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression> containing an empty string ("") to this collection.
